title: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
description: Bug 19089 - No popup menu in java editor ruler (Photon)
OB: When I open a java editor and right-click on the left vertical ruler, a menu should pop up allowing me to add breakpoints or marks. However, the menu does not appear.
EB: I expect that when I right-click on the left vertical ruler, a popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints or marks.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1) Open a java editor2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler
